cast.overview: Dangal is an extraordinary true story based on the life of Mahavir Singh and his two daughters, Geeta and Babita Phogat. The film traces the inspirational journey of a father who trains his daughters to become world class wrestlers.
cast.title: Dangal

details.biography: Ritwik Sahore is the son of Mr.Rajesh Sahore and Mrs.Monica Sahore.He went to Gokul Dham High School, Goregaon and he is Hindu by religion. Some of Ritwiks hobbies are Watching & Playing Football, Swimming, Playing Table Tennis. His Favorite actors are Aamir Khan, Boman Irani and Sharman Joshi.
details.name: Ritwik Sahore
